group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]Damn, I seriously can't land a hit!

group_1.textLeft: No matter how many times you come at me,@it will be the same!
From the start, the gap between our physical@strength and yours is too great.
Prolonging this into an endurance battle is also@impossible for you.

group_1.textRight: Then come at us too so we can get this over with!

group_1.textLeft: Magical Girls exist to help people.

group_1.textRight: Yes, we would never hurt anyone,@regardless of who they are...

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...
If they keep this up, we might have to resort to@your unique magic.

group_1.textRight: True, unless I deplete their energy I'm not@sure this will come to an end anytime soon...
It ain't no fun if they don't fight back.@Maybe we gotta call in two extra guys.

group_1.textLeft: If we keep being made fun of like this,@we'll just end up a laughingstock.

group_1.textRight: If I could, I would've hit you to put a stop to it.

group_1.textLeft: ...That will only lead to more bad rumors.@Kurusu, please.

group_1.textRight: I'm afraid we have no choice.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, Shirogane...?!

group_1.textRight: If you keep this up, I am going to call the police.

group_1.textLeft: Trying to put a damper on us, huh...@What, you wanna get involved?

group_1.textRight: The friends you call won't be coming here,
because our people have already stopped@them outside.

group_1.textLeft: ......[wait:0.8][chara:801100:cheek_0][chara:801100:lipSynch_1]Tsk.

group_1.textRight: Looks like the damper's done.@C'mon, let's go.

group_1.textLeft: But, if we don't...

group_1.textRight: If the cops show up, there's gonna be no point@in talkin' about retaliation.
Since we're the ones who'd get into trouble@for attacking them.
Phew...@Are you alright, Himuro-senpai?

group_1.textLeft: Thank you...@But just how did you know we were here...?

group_1.textRight: I saw a bunch of unruly people causing a@commotion and couldn't help but feel concerned.

group_1.textLeft: You must possess a wild instinct.@Thank you, ma'am.
I appreciate your help as well. If you had been@just a little later, I would've used my magic.

group_1.textRight: Being Magical Girls, you will be cast as the@villains if you resist and fight back.
Even if you try to justify yourselves, it will only@be seen as a staged scheme.
That's why I believed this situation to be@genuinely dangerous.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's just as you say...
By the way, didn't you mention earlier@that you had companions?

group_1.textRight: Yes, due to incidents like what occurred just now,
I have decided to form an organization which@advocates for Magical Girls.
While Urara Yume's show has undoubtedly@garnered you many enemies,
it has also, to some extent, drawn in allies.
Since I am sure there are people out there@who have been saved by Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: How are you, someone with no intentions of@doing anything, able to suddenly...

group_1.textRight: This is all to protect you, Himuro-senpai.
Ever since I began having trouble connecting@with other people in my life,
I have been tethered to this world through@your recognition.
That's why, I now wish to extend a helping hand@to my suffering Senpai.
It's quite miraculous, you know.
Being around other people doesn't feel so@bothersome anymore.

group_1.textLeft: I'm quite happy that you've found some kind@of purpose, Shirogane.
But, doing this for my sake...@I'm truly sorry for worrying you...

group_1.textRight: By never meddling in my affairs, you ensured that@even during times I felt empty, I did not suffer.
Please allow me to repay you for the times@you saved me, Senpai.
Also, Miura-san.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what is it?

group_1.textRight: Are you acquainted with someone named Kuroda?

group_1.textLeft: ...We are classmates.

group_1.textRight: The reason why I established an organization full@of supporters is because of him.

group_1.textLeft: You don't mean...

group_1.textRight: He's gathering people with the goal of@exterminating Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: What...
